application.name: viknosalt
application.brief: Initial Clean-up of Viking Orbiter Level 1 images
application.description: This program will perform the first portion of the level 1 processing sequence on a Viking Orbiter PDS image, the cleanup of salt noise in the image.

history.change: Now uses Pipeline to execute chain of applications.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The cube to be cleaned. The cube will be ran through a series of filters to remove salt noise.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The resultant cube containing the cleaned data.

parameter.name: REMOVE
parameter.description: Option to remove or leave intermediate cube files made by the application

example.brief: Input Viking Image to have salt noise removed
example.description: This example shows the viknosalt application in action. It removes all salt noise from the image.

terminalInterface.description: Input a viking image to remove salt noise from and give it an output file name.

image.brief: Viking Image to Remove Salt Noise from
image.description: This is the input viking image prior to the removal of white noise.
This is the viking image after the viknosalt application has been run.
